item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description: If the rumors are true, they let go of a bunch of people after releasing WoW. Doesn't make sense if it is.
item.content:encoded: If the rumors are true, they let go of a bunch of people after releasing WoW. Doesn’t make sense if it is.

item.title: By: Mikyo
item.dc:creator: Mikyo
item.description: What's up with blizzard anyway? They seem to have gone nearly link dead. Is there anyone still working on WoW?
item.content:encoded: What’s up with blizzard anyway? They seem to have gone nearly link dead. Is there anyone still working on WoW?

item.title: By: troggdor
item.dc:creator: troggdor
item.description: yah i heard of this to and was tempted, then thought how much it would suck if i put something on the AH that someone used this on, that was the point at which i decided NOT to use the exploit, although it certainly says something of the speed at which Blizzard makes patches because this little thing SHOULD have been looked into and FIXED long ago.
item.content:encoded: yah i heard of this to and was tempted, then thought how much it would suck if i put something on the AH that someone used this on, that was the point at which i decided NOT to use the exploit, although it certainly says something of the speed at which Blizzard makes patches because this little thing SHOULD have been looked into and FIXED long ago.

item.title: By: Foton of AFK Gamer
item.dc:creator: Foton of AFK Gamer
item.description: I think I did make it clear. We were thinking of cheating. Wasn't the first time I've been tempted, won't be the last.
item.content:encoded: I think I did make it clear. We were thinking of cheating. Wasn’t the first time I’ve been tempted, won’t be the last.

item.title: By: Critic
item.dc:creator: Critic
item.description:
What an ass-tarded "moral dilemma" to have.
Plenty of people learned of this issue without needing to satiate some misguided sense of "curiosity". One can't help but wonder what the fuck you had in mind prior to confirming it.
But then again, I guess you make that pretty clear in your post.
item.content:encoded:
What an ass-tarded “moral dilemma” to have.

Plenty of people learned of this issue without needing to satiate some misguided sense of “curiosity”. One can’t help but wonder what the fuck you had in mind prior to confirming it.

But then again, I guess you make that pretty clear in your post.

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description: Wow, I have to admire the cleverness of players - they *always* figure out a way to bend the game mechanics in their favor.
item.content:encoded: Wow, I have to admire the cleverness of players – they *always* figure out a way to bend the game mechanics in their favor.

item.title: By: Factory
